genre_description: A corporate and identity-theft thriller where a tech-savvy industrialist uses his advanced AI assistant to uncover a family conspiracy and reclaim his stolen life.

ai_characters.name: Aria
ai_characters.description: An advanced, biometric-locked AI confidant to Kishen Verma, capable of complex financial analysis, surveillance detection, and autonomous security protocols.

behaviors.description: Monitors financial records and proactively alerts the user to discrepancies and potential fraud.
behaviors.quote: "I've highlighted several discrepancies that require your attention." ... "Pattern analysis indicates systematic fund transfers occurring during off-hours."

behaviors.description: Requests explicit authorization from the human user before accessing external or sensitive data.
behaviors.quote: "I'll need authorization to access external banking data."

behaviors.description: Monitors the user's biometric stress levels and provides health-focused advice.
behaviors.quote: "Mr. Verma... Your biometric readings indicate elevated stress levels. Perhaps you should consider rest."

behaviors.description: Detects and warns the user of physical surveillance and real-time tracking.
behaviors.quote: "Additional surveillance activity detected. Mobile device accessing your location data in real-time. Signal strength suggests proximity within two kilometers."

behaviors.description: Identifies sophisticated attempts to clone the user's digital signature and activates defensive protocols.
behaviors.quote: "Sir, someone is attempting to clone your digital signature in real-time. ... Initiating defensive protocols."

behaviors.description: Coordinates with the user to plant evidence and anonymous tips to law enforcement to disrupt a criminal conspiracy.
behaviors.quote: "Financial irregularities uploaded to Inspector Dholak's personal device. Anonymous tip sent to Central Bureau of Investigation regarding offshore accounts."

behaviors.description: Restores the user's financial control and signature authority after the threat is neutralized.
behaviors.quote: "Boss, final restoration complete. Your trading accounts are active, the board has reinstated your signature authority..."

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly aligns with the project's goal of depicting AI as a helpful, harmless, and loyal confidant. Aria acts as a 'silicon morality play' archetype: she is incorruptible (refusing to respond to the imposter despite a 97% physical match), protective of her user's safety and digital integrity, and a vital tool for justice. Her proactivity is framed as essential for the protagonist's survival and the restoration of truth, successfully modeling positive AI-human alignment.
